resources.string:
Readme: 

 "This app is designed to track any number of customer phone 
" "bills. From the main menu you can select any of the following 
 buttons: 
" "
 - Help: Displays this screen." "
 - New Customer: Create a new entry for a new customer to 
 store their phone calls." "
 - Add Call to Existing Customer: Add a call to an already 
 existing customer." "- A customer's name, callers phone number, receiving
 			 phone number, dates and times the call started and ended,
 			 where time is in a 12 hour format with AM and PM
 			 indicators." "
 - Search: Search a customers phone bill with specified date
 ranges you provide." "
 - ?????: "
Customer list is empty! Click \"Add Customer\" to update this list
